name: Cute Pet Balloons
description:
Cats and Dogs were trapped in balloons by a mad scientist and were sent floating into the sky, the time you have to save them is short so you gotta be quick, before is too late. During the gameplay you'll be able to collect power ups, that will give a boost while rescuing the pets, and coins that you can use to buy power ups upgrades at the Cute Pet Shop. The game has very colorful graphics and funny sounds and animations, you can change the visual of the pets buying new skins at the shop and challenge yourself to complete all the achievements in the game.

Features

• Achievements
• Funny Animations
• Colorful Graphics
• Power Ups
• Fun Skins(from zombie dogs to famous Memes SUCH PETS, MUCH BALLONS, WOW)
• Easy to play
• More content will be add in the game soon
